skillTree.localised_description: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can fire while on the move.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.
Although a black-hearted cutthroat of the first order, he is also notoriously a man of his word, which is also the main reason why The Directorate hired him and his pirate crew.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 when fighting at sea
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: As far as the tide stretches inland, so too does the Sea God's influence.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Only 20 cannons? Are you kidding me, I need at least 60. I'm not sailing otherwise, the Albatross needs to be the greatest warship ever created."

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Extra Powder" for artillery units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Captain van der Kraal never sails sober. The sea goes one way, Captain van der Kraal the other. Makes the rockin' bearable.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +15% for Sartosan Pirates
	(Lord's army)

Missile damage: +15% for Sartosan Pirates
	(Lord's army)

Attribute: Causes Fear for Sartosan Pirates
	(Lord's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +10 for Sartosan Pirates
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Van Der Kraal has escaped death a great many times over the years, fought against the dark-mist kindred of the Cursed Marshes and lived, raided the Norscan coast with fire and sword and it is said even survived shipwreck on the infamous Vampire Coast of Lustria and somehow returned to tell the tale.

effects.description:
Immune to High Seas attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -75% casualties suffered from high seas, reef, maelstrom and storm attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "For the last time Steven, WE ARE NOT PIRATES! We are privateers in the service of Marienburg, we have a written contract to plunder these seas, this is all legitimate business, not pirating, if I hear you questioning this again you'll walk the plank!"

effects.description: Bonus vs. Large: +12 when fighting against Vampire Coast and Rogue Armies

Leadership: +6 when fighting against Vampire Coast and Rogue Armies
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Yes, they’re from the east. Annoying, yet useful - their hides, particularly…"
If there's swash to be buckled, this one will be right at the front, in the thick of the fray.
This one will not go down easily - it will be necessary to break both the will and the body first.
Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…
"Dark Magic might be effective, but there's no substitute for a good blade in your hands."
You have to watch this one - when you shake their hand, count your fingers afterwards.
Death is always just a shot away.
"It's got a few secret ingredients. No, I won't tell you what they are, but the results will speak for themselves."
"Get more ammo up here, NOW!!!!!!!!"
A clever arrangement of lenses makes the target seem just that bit closer.
Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
Some beings just want to see the world burn.

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs 25 men unit or above

skillTree.localised_description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: “We march to war for our Emperor, and Sigmar, our saviour and lord.”

skillTree.localised_description: "Listen very carefully, me hearties, I shall say this only once… Quiet! Stromfels' stinkin' breath!"
The frontline will either make or break you. Those who survive become the backbone of any army.

skillTree.localised_description: "Now listen up an' listen good… here be the plan…"
Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.
Edvard has survived calamities and wounds uncounted, although he's lost a few bits and pieces of himself along the way.
If it's not tacked down, this one'll 'ave it and kill anyone who gets in their way.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +5%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: "You'll never find such a crew - villainous scum, the lot of 'em. I certainly wouldn't want to be facing 'em in the thick of battle!"

Leadership: +2 when fighting at sea
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +4 when fighting at sea
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 when fighting at sea
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: There's a time in every sailor's, er, life when the black flag seems like the best, if not the only option.
"The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.
Take care of your ship and she will have a care for your wellbeing in return.
Such things keep the eternal players' of this world alive.
This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can fire while on the move.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

factionEffects.localised_description: Edvard Van Der Kraal is the dreaded field commander of the infamous Manann's Blades, a powerful mercenary regiment owned and operated via intermediaries of the shadowy Merchant Lords of Marienburg.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -30% for Regiments of Renown
	(all armies)

items.colour_text: One of Van Der Kraal's most precious prizes, taken from a weird temple located in Lustria. Rumours suggested it was previously occupied by a crazed female-only cult who worshipped a snake god, but those are only rumours, that can't be true..

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve change: -10% when increasing
	(local region)
